Author: PsychLegalMind

Comment: China probably doesn’t like the optics of appearing to cut deals to pacify the U.S. when the U.S. is creating the issue with respect to tariffs.  Almost certainly after all of the press coverage over the weekend about potential Chinese officials at the White House, possible deals being discussed, etc. and assuming the two sides weren’t really that close, China may just have backed off completely to leave the U.S. to implode and watch Trump flail.  It preserves China’s image that it wants to project.  First rule of tariff negotiating club is that you don’t talk about it.    And that’s all assuming talks were even actually happening, which we still don’t know for certain.
